_sText:
Counter-Strike: Source : Bot's Navigation Mesh for the map CS_PENSION


Nav Creator: Meurglis3, Release Date: June 15 2014

Here is the Navigation Mesh for excellent realistic assault-themed map [cs_pension](http://css.gamebanana.com/maps/179851) by Dinus Saurus (released March 2014).
It's a totally created from scratch and manually optimized .nav-file (because in original author's archive was included slightly edited auto-gen .nav-file - not fully playable).

Most of areas and paths were remade manually (about 80% of all area of map). Some broken-off important pathways were restored (in particular - a way from a porch over boxes to a cellar, exits through window apertures, etc.).

Well... bots have opportunity to use all walkable ways now. Be sure, that they will serve you in compliance with all rules of hospitality! :D

Also this Navigation Mesh is fully Place Painted.

NOTE: For possibility of comparison and in-game testing the original .nav-file by map creator available to downloading with the [same map](http://css.gamebanana.com/maps/179851).

Fight and Fun! Your remarks and feedbacks are always welcomed :-)

Credits and Gratitudes:
   Dinus Saurus (for high detailed and very realistic urban-themed map).

Additional Gratitudes:
   BarnDoor (for perfect playable navigation meshes for many fine CS:S maps),
   Chizbone (for informative and clever article BOT_BRAINED and a set of excellent navigation meshes),
   CoCoNUT (for fine hand-tuned navigation meshes for many fine CS:S maps),
   Valve Developer Community (for learning articles by Navigation Meshes and Navigation Mesh Commands).

Room reservation is temporarily cancelled: SWAT are working!

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

**UPDATED 11.11.2014**

General Fixes:
- Added Place Names;
- Some other minor changes.

**PLEASE REDOWNLOAD UPDATED ARCHIVE!**
